Tasha Brightbottle was a Zhentarim hin rogue from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Tasha felt blessed to be born a halfling. She was deft and plucky since her early years.
Tasha was born into a pastoral hin community. Growing up, she gained respect from her peers for her attitude and roguish talent, helped by the womans short stature. At a young age, Tasha was given cruel lessons in life, that sometimes ones hands were bound to be bloodied if the job was to be done. This eventually led her to join the Black Network, the dreaded Zhentarim, as a perfect assassin. Tasha enjoyed the respect the organization had for her skills and the fact that Zhents got to wear the coolest clothes only sealed the deal. When not tasked with the Networks dark business, Tasha Brightbottle enjoyed wandering towns and cities in the guise of a simple messenger. During such strolls, the hin Zhen gathered intel and assessed possible threats to her organization. In the 1490s DR, aged one hundred and seventy-five winters, Tashas work led her to the city of Baldurs Gate â€“ a hive of plots, agendas, dark secrets, and expert snooping. During her time in the Gate, Tasha found herself knee-deep in various misadventures.
